  <title>regional_livestock_migration_routes(150518)</title>
  <abstract>The raw data was obtained through a participatory mapping exercise involving key stakeholders in livestock sector led by staff from ILRI. The data was then digitized and validated to produce this final layer

This layer shows the approximate location of livestock migration routes which include; 1. Major functional routes 3. Major functional seasonal route 4. Major non-functional route 5. Minor functional route 6. Minor non-functional route</abstract>
